name: Precarious
description:
In a world where jobs are nowhere to be found, you find yourself having to make tough decisions in order to survive. Selling your organs might make you live another day, but how long can you hold out like this?!

Ludum Dare 44 project : Precarious

Dev : Louison Hernoux @norfma

Art : Caroline Merlier @SheeroChana

Music: Comfortable Mystery 4 Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
